question: Chabahar Port, which was making news recently, is located in which country?
explanation:
India has supplied two Mobile Harbour Cranes (MHC) to Iranâ€™s Chabahar port. This is a part of a USD 25 Million contract agreement between India and Iran to deliver 6 number of Mobile Harbour Cranes to the port.
India and Iran entered into a bilateral contract in 2016 amounting USD 85 million for equipping, mechanizing and starting operations at Shahid Beheshti Port of Chabahar.
